channel.title: Surface Tension Loading Bug(can't shoot)
channel.description:
I've just finished Questionable ethics. I've pushed the button to open the gate(hence to load surface tension first map) and the game has freezed for good amount of time(without showing "loading..."). When,finally, bm unfreezed I could move but I couldn't shoot with the Mp5.
I tried to load again and I had the same issue.
[b]This is what is shown in the console after trying to load the save again.[/b] [quote] Loading game from SAVE\autosave.sav... SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_desert/pylon01a_skybox.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_desert/pylon01a_skybox.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_desert/pylon01a_skybox.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_desert/mesa05_skybox.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_desert/mesa06_skybox.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_desert/mesa03_skybox.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_desert/mesa02_skybox.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_desert/mesa01_skybox.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_desert/mesa01_skybox.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_desert/mesa04a_skybox.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_desert/mesa04b_skybox.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_desert/mesa01_skybox.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_st/bridgeexplode04.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_st/c2a5a_camo_net.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_st/bridgeexplode03.mdl) Loading game from //MOD/SAVE/bm_c2a5a.HL1... func_breakable (m35b_dmg_brush) at (-3520.000 388.000 1328.000) using obsolete or unknown material type. func_breakable (vic_dmg_brush) at (-2215.690 2433.870 1333.970) using obsolete or unknown material type. func_breakable (ute_dmg_brush) at (-2187.260 2686.030 1351.940) using obsolete or unknown material type. func_breakable (m35a_dmg_brush) at (-2906.060 2251.860 1340.000) using obsolete or unknown material type. Dead end link: intake_path_1_6 Redownloading all lightmaps No caption found for 'grenade.scraperough' [/quote] [b]Getpos[/b] [quote] ] getpos setpos 1208.552246 7861.135254 1472.031250;setang 11.473256 -104.481361 0.000000 Physics queue not empty, error! [/quote] [b]status[/b] [quote] ] status hostname: Half-Life 2 version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c2a5a at: 1207 x, 7862 y, 1471 z players : 1 (1 max)
# userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr [/quote] [b]My specs:[/b] Windows 7 32bit 3 Gb Ram Intel core duo T9300 @ 2.50 Ghz Nvidia Geforce 9500m GS
It's a notebook and I've played on it HL2 and Portal 2
[b]I downloaded it using your torrent file.[/b]

item.title: Surface Tension Loading Bug(can't shoot)
item.dc:creator: elivance
item.description:
lexa2:

Thanks for your report. Thus, it’s a yet another instance of the “weapon suddenly lost” problem. Unfortunately you’re not alone hitting this bug and I hadn’t seen any real solution for it so far.

You can always put a weapon in your hand using the proper console command
but I did it in order to help devs to fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Surface Tension Loading Bug(can't shoot)
item.dc:creator: elivance
item.description:
Update:

I’ve played BM again and I’ve loaded the same save (autosave).
The game runs smooth now but I’ve lost the MP5(is not shown in the HUD).
I had to take one from a dead soldier in order to use it again and everything seems ok.

This is the console log of this session

Loading game from SAVE\autosave.sav…

item.title: Surface Tension Loading Bug(can't shoot)
item.dc:creator: elivance
item.description:
I’ve just finished Questionable ethics.
I’ve pushed the button to open the gate(hence to load surface tension first map) and the game has freezed for good amount of time(without showing “loading…”).
When,finally, bm unfreezed I could move but I couldn’t shoot with the Mp5.
